channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade Outerwear
channel.desc: A wide range of high-quality, fashion-inspired coats and jackets in soft, luxurious fabrics. This competitively-priced collection is designed to complete your daytime or evening look to perfection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Footwear
channel.desc: Discover the latest trends in footwear this season with our range of transitional styles. Keep your best foot forward, and never compromise on style and comfort.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dressage by Paul Costelloe
channel.desc: Discover the elegance of Paul's Costelloe's Dressage collection. Embodying simplicity and luxury, and using high-quality leathers, fittings and techniques to bring his inspirational designs to life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: EMU Footwear
channel.desc: Showcase of Australian born, based and owned brand EMU that has passionately produced the world's finest premium sheepskin and Merino wool products for over 20 years.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: A Seasonal Style Refresh
channel.desc: Unveil the season's most sought-after dresses and more, expertly curated for those seeking a fashion refresh and on-trend style, only on QVC.
